name: Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle™ is a super addictive game that challenges you to fit hexa pieces into the board and complete images. This game is a perfect match for any puzzle lover to play an enjoy hundreds of addictive and fun jigsaws. Drag and drop the hexa shapes, fill the board and complete the level. You get the fun and excitement of a challenging puzzles game with the added enjoyment of beautiful photos to put together!

Enjoy Fun Game Features:

- Free & fun game: Solve free puzzles and enjoy hours of fun!

- New quests every day: Get the daily quests and always stay challenged!

- Play in an offline game mode: Even if you have no WiFi or no internet connection, you can still have fun. Play offline anytime, anywhere.

- Stress reliever: These free jigsaw puzzles are a relaxing way to wind down after a long day.

- Easy to play: Just tap the hexa pieces and drag them on the puzzle board to move them around and complete beautiful photos.

- Boost your skills: Train your brain as you solve new puzzles and advance to exciting levels. This is the best skills game for you!

- Indulge yourself with the top recommended game: Jigsaw puzzles are highly recommended for having the best funtime!

- High-quality photos collection: The high quality of these photo puzzles really makes Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle™ something special.

- Free hints for more fun: Win free hints to help you complete every challenge.

- Compatible with iOS mobile and iPad devices: Whether you have an iPhone, iPad, Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle™ will work on your device.

- Best time killer for adults: This addicting tap and drag game will keep you busy and entertained.

Each level is designed around a different theme and discovers an awesome collection of pictures. Explore cute kittens and pets puzzles, fabulous street art images, interior design worlds, food, and sweets quests and many more. Sharpen your matching skills while completing epic and cool photos, and enjoy loads of awesome levels!

Get ready to have the time of your life with this exciting jigsaw puzzle game. Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle™!


Hexa Jigsaw Puzzle™ is free to download and play but contains in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hrs before current period ends. Manage subscriptions via iTunes account settings.
